description: Moved from closed source to open source. Fixed several logic loops; and created a settings file instead of hard coding the variables in the script

versions.description: Added Revoke of sign in tokens for When password is changed. Added subject check for users within your domain. Set lookback days to default to 3 to not accidently delete all users email.Added Requires for modules needed. Changed Function Get-rulesMenu to alter variable from $rules, to $rulesmenu; also turn this into an array by default so users with 1 rule will generate a menu
Initial version for release after internal testing
Added validation checks on the Read-Host prompt. Added $adminuser before Get-credential to save the username and prompt for password to clearify woridng and descriptions
